Sentencas: A detailed mathematical model of a direct internal reforming solid oxide fuel cell (DIR-SOFC) incorporating with simulation of chemical and physical processes in the fuel cell is presented.
Titulo: Numerical simulation of a direct internal reforming solid oxide fuel cell using computational fluid dynamics method

Sentencas: The model is developed based on the reforming and electrochemical reaction mechanisms, mass and energy conservation, and heat transfer.
Titulo: Numerical simulation of a direct internal reforming solid oxide fuel cell using computational fluid dynamics method

Sentencas: A computational fluid dynamics (CFD) method is used for solving the complicated multiple partial differential equations (PDEs) to obtain the numerical approximations.
Titulo: Numerical simulation of a direct internal reforming solid oxide fuel cell using computational fluid dynamics method

Sentencas: The resulting distributions of chemical species concentrations, temperature and current density in a cross-flow DIR-SOFC are given and analyzed in detail.
Titulo: Numerical simulation of a direct internal reforming solid oxide fuel cell using computational fluid dynamics method

Sentencas: Further, the influence between distributions of chemical species concentrations, temperature and current density during the simulation is illustrated and discussed.
Titulo: Numerical simulation of a direct internal reforming solid oxide fuel cell using computational fluid dynamics method

Sentencas: The heat and mass transfer, and the kinetics of reforming and electrochemical reactions have significant effects on the parameter distributions within the cell.
Titulo: Numerical simulation of a direct internal reforming solid oxide fuel cell using computational fluid dynamics method

Sentencas: The results show the particular characteristics of the DIR-SOFC among fuel cells, and can aid in stack design and control.
Titulo: Numerical simulation of a direct internal reforming solid oxide fuel cell using computational fluid dynamics method
